Title: Relates to premium rates for workers' compensation insurance
Summary: Relates to premium rates for workers' compensation insurance; provides that when an employee has concurrent employment at one employer, such employer shall pay premium rates for workers' compensation insurance for such employee based on the applicable group and class for each employment if such employer keeps complete and accurate payroll records.
LawCode: Amd ยง89, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to premium rates for workers' compensation insurance
